onHardwareVideoAvailable().Description: Called when the underlying hardware TV input session calls @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#Session#notifyVideoAvailable_E@.

Returns: true if the surface was set successfully, false otherwise.
Parameters: Surface: The surface to be used for video rendering. Can be null. This value may be null.
onSetSurface(android.view.Surface).Description: This method will not be called in @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#HardwareSession_E@. Framework will forward the application's surface to the hardware TV input.

getHardwareInputId().Description: Returns the hardware TV input ID the external device is connected to. TV input is expected to provide @B_android#R#attr#setupActivity_E@ so that the application can launch it before using this TV input. The setup activity may let the user select the hardware TV input to which the external device is connected. The ID of the selected one should be stored in the TV input so that it can be returned here.

Parameters: Context: The context of the application

int: The reason that the hardware TV input stopped the playback: TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_UNKNOWN TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_TUNING TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_WEAK_SIGNAL TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_BUFFERING TvInputManager#VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE_REASON_AUDIO_ONLY
onHardwareVideoUnavailable(int).Description: Called when the underlying hardware TV input session calls @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#Session#notifyVideoUnavailable_E@.

ClassDesc: Base class for a TV input session which represents an external device connected to a hardware TV input. This class is for an input which provides channels for the external set-top box to the application. Once a TV input returns an implementation of this class on @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#onCreateSession_E@, the framework will create a separate session for a hardware TV Input (e.g. HDMI 1) and forward the application's surface to the session so that the user can see the screen of the hardware TV Input when she tunes to a channel from this TV input. The implementation of this class is expected to change the channel of the external set-top box via a proprietary protocol when @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#Session#onTune_E@ is requested by the application. Note that this class is not for inputs for internal hardware like built-in tuner and HDMI 1.
